short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free PDF to Flipbook converter to transform your PDF into digital flipping book.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free PDF to Flipbook converter designed to convert PDF into Flipbook (browsable PDF file) and get a more beautiful and dynamic reading experience. Using the extension is very simple: once installed on Chrome just open it and select the PDF file to convert to Flipbook. 

After a few seconds the flipbook PDF will appear on the browser (chrome). It is possible to customize the background and logo for a better result. With the upgrade to PRO it is also possible to save the flipbook locally (in an HTML file) to view it offline or to publish it on your website.
